step_feedback.feedback: Great job sitting or standing comfortably! Keep your hands on your abdomen as instructed.
You're doing well placing your hands on your abdomen. Remember to inhale slowly through your nose.
Focus on tightening your whole body muscles as you inhale. Visualize the fluid moving to your chest.
Excellent! Exhale slowly through your mouth and relax your muscles. Visualize pushing fluid out.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with deep breathing! Remember to inhale through your nose, tightening your body, and exhale through your mouth, relaxing. This helps your lymphatic system work smoothly.
